scripts.start-template: pnpm generateAccount && pnpm faucet && pnpm dapp-publish && pnpm storeConfig
scripts.dapp-publish: pnpm dubhe publish --network testnet --config-path ./assets/Scripts/dubhe.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.upgrade: pnpm dubhe upgrade --network testnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
